segments.text: The girl’s posture is so attentive as she waits for her cookie; it’s almost adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I admire how she’s not rushing the boy but patiently awaiting her turn.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: However, that patience doesn’t alter the fact that more could go wrong here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a knot in my stomach as I watch the boy precariously reach deeper into the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder if they even understand how risky this little adventure is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window lets in a breeze, and I can almost hear the garden calling them outside, away from this mayhem.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sometimes, I think children live in a world where the consequences of their actions are far away.
segments.speaker: PAR
